languages.text: "Внезапное вторжение могло стоить вашим людям жизней. Им повезло, что я запозднилась за книгой и в свете люменов признала одежды Кровавой паутины. В следующий раз... лучше стучитесь".

traits.locale_text: "Внезапное вторжение могло стоить вашим людям жизней. Им повезло, что сегодня я читала допоздна и в свете люменов признала одежды Кровавой паутины, не успев распахнуть третье око. В следующий раз... лучше стучитесь".

languages.text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."
languages.original_text: "Внезапное вторжение могло стоить вашим людям жизней. Им повезло, что я запозднилась за книгой и в свете люменов признала одежды Кровавой паутины. В следующий раз... лучше стучитесь".

traits.locale_text: "A sudden invasion could cost your people their lives. They were fortunate I was up late reading a book and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... Knock on the door next time."

"That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

languages.text: «Esa invasión repentina podría haberle costado la vida a su gente. Tuvieron suerte de que estuviera despierta leyendo y reconociera los ropajes de la Red Sanguinolenta bajo la luz de los lumens. Por favor... la próxima vez, llamen a la puerta».
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

traits.locale_text: «Esa invasión repentina podría haberle costado la vida a su gente. Tuvieron suerte de que estuviera despierta leyendo y reconociera los ropajes de la Red Sanguinolenta bajo la luz de los lumens. Por favor... la próxima vez, llamen a la puerta».

languages.text: 「突然な侵略は、民の命が奪われる可能性があったんです。私が夜更かししてルーメンの光の中で、ブラッドスパン・ウェブについての本を読んでいたのが、幸いでした。次回はドアをノックしてください」
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

traits.locale_text: 「突然な侵略は、民の命が奪われる可能性があったんです。私が夜更かししてルーメンの光の中で、ブラッドスパン・ウェブについての本を読んでいたのが、幸いでした。次回はドアをノックしてください」

languages.text: “之前突如其来的闯入，本可能会让你们的织网者付出生命的代价。他们很走运，因为我当时正在熬夜看书，通过流明灯的光线辨认出了织血罗网的制服。拜托……下次记得敲门。”
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

traits.locale_text: “之前突如其来的闯入，本可能会让你们的织网者付出生命的代价。他们很走运，因为我当时正在熬夜看书，通过流明灯的光线辨认出了织血罗网的制服。拜托……下次记得敲门。”

languages.text: "Dieses plötzliche Eindringen hätte Eure Leute ihr Leben kosten können. Zu ihrem Glück habe ich noch spät gelesen und erkannte die Kleidung des Blutgesponnenen Netzes im Licht der Lumen. Bitte ... klopft beim nächsten Mal an."
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses plötzliche Eindringen hätte Eure Leute ihr Leben kosten können. Zu ihrem Glück habe ich noch spät gelesen und erkannte die Kleidung des Blutgesponnenen Netzes im Licht der Lumen. Bitte ... klopft beim nächsten Mal an."

languages.text: « Cette subite incursion aurait pu coûter la vie à vos gens. Heureusement que mes lectures m'ont tenue éveillée assez tard et que j'ai reconnu l'accoutrement de la Toile de Sang à la lumière des lumens. La prochaine fois, pensez à frapper avant d'entrer. »
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."

traits.locale_text: « Cette subite incursion aurait pu coûter la vie à vos gens. Heureusement que mes lectures m'ont tenue éveillée assez tard et que j'ai reconnu l'accoutrement de la Toile de Sang à la lumière des lumens. La prochaine fois, pensez à frapper avant d'entrer. »

languages.text: "Aniden gerçekleşen o istila, halkının canına mal olabilirdi. Geç saate kadar bir şeyler okuduğum ve lümenlerin ışığında Kanipi Ağı giysilerini fark ettiğim için şanslılar. Yalnız rica ediyorum... Gelecek sefere kapıyı çal."
languages.original_text: "That sudden invasion could have cost your people their lives. They were fortunate that I was up late reading and recognised the garments of the Bloodspun Web in the lumens' light. Please... knock on the door next time."
